Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Our scanners have detected a faint signal of unknown origin, hidden deep within thick vegetation. We should try and clear the overgrowth to trace the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在茂密的植被深处侦测到了一个来历不明的微弱信号，我们应该试着清理这些疯长的植物，找到信号的源头。
Our scanners are detecting a clear signal of unknown origin, hidden deep within thick vegetation. We should try and clear the overgrowth to trace the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在茂密的植被深处侦测到了一个来历不明的清晰信号，我们应该试着清理这些疯长的植物，找到信号的源头。
Our scanners are detecting an extremely powerful signal of unknown origin, hidden deep within thick vegetation. We should try and clear the overgrowth to trace the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在茂密的植被深处侦测到了一个来历不明的强烈信号，我们应该试着清理这些疯长的植物，找到信号的源头。
Our scanners have detected a faint signal of unknown origin, being emitted from a distinct sandbank in the desert. We should excavate the sand to uncover the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在沙漠中的一片沙丘中侦测到了一个来历不明的微弱信号，我们应该挖掘沙土，找到信号的来源。
Our scanners are detecting a clear signal of unknown origin, being emitted from a distinct sandbank in the desert. We should excavate the sand to uncover the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在沙漠中的一片沙丘中侦测到了一个来历不明的清晰信号，我们应该挖掘沙土，找到信号的来源。
Our scanners are detecting an extremely powerful signal of unknown origin, being emitted from a distinct sandbank in the desert. We should excavate the sand to uncover the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在沙漠中的一片沙丘中侦测到了一个来历不明的强烈信号，我们应该挖掘沙土，找到信号的来源。
Our scanners have detected a faint signal of unknown origin, seemingly emerging from deep within a glacier. If we burn through the ice, we could locate the signal's origin.
我们的扫描仪在冰川深处侦测到了一个来历不明的微弱信号，如果我们能够融化冰层，应该就能找到信号的来源。
Our scanners are detecting a clear signal of unknown origin, seemingly emerging from deep within a glacier. If we burn through the ice, we could locate the signal's origin.
我们的扫描仪在冰川深处侦测到了一个来历不明的清晰信号，如果我们能够融化冰层，应该就能找到信号的来源。
Our scanners are detecting an extremely powerful signal of unknown origin, seemingly emerging from deep within a glacier. If we burn through the ice, we could locate the signal's origin.
我们的扫描仪在冰川深处侦测到了一个来历不明的强烈信号，如果我们能够融化冰层，应该就能找到信号的来源。

Our scanners have detected a faint signal of unknown origin, covered by large clusters of fungal growth on some vegetation. We should carefully remove the clusters of fungi to extricate the source of the signal.
我们的扫描仪在某种被大量真菌覆盖的植被上侦测到了一个来历不明的微弱信号，我们应该小心地清除这片真菌，找到信号的源头。

Our scanners are detecting a clear signal of unknown origin, covered by large clusters of fungal growth on some vegetation. We should carefully remove the clusters of fungi to extricate the source of the signal.
我们的扫描仪在某种被大量真菌覆盖的植被上侦测到了一个来历不明的清晰信号，我们应该小心地清除这片真菌，找到信号的源头。

Our scanners are detecting an extremely powerful signal of unknown origin, covered by large clusters of fungal growth on some vegetation. We should carefully remove the clusters of fungi to extricate the source of the signal.
我们的扫描仪在某种被大量真菌覆盖的植被上侦测到了一个来历不明的强烈信号，我们应该小心地清除这片真菌，找到信号的源头。
Our scanners have detected a faint signal of unknown origin, emanating from under a mountain of ash and debris. We should clear the debris and find the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在一片灰烬和残骸中侦测到了一个来历不明的微弱信号，我们应该清理这些残骸，找到信号的源头。
Our scanners are detecting a clear signal of unknown origin, emanating from under a mountain of ash and debris. We should clear the debris and find the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在一片灰烬和残骸中侦测到了一个来历不明的清晰信号，我们应该清理这些残骸，找到信号的源头。
Our scanners are detecting an extremely powerful signal of unknown origin, emanating from under a mountain of ash and debris. We should clear the debris and find the signal's source.
我们的扫描仪在一片灰烬和残骸中侦测到了一个来历不明的强烈信号，我们应该清理这些残骸，找到信号的源头。
Hidden in the wilderness lie sprawling remains of unknown purpose. We need to carefully explore this site to uncover its function and any lurking threats.
隐匿在荒野中的废墟不知藏着什么秘密。我们需要小心探索这个地点，发现这里的用途和任何潜在的威胁。
Excavating the sand to uncover the source of the signal…
挖掘沙土，找到信号的源头…
Burning through the ice to locate the signal's origin…
融化冰层，找到信号的源头…
Removing the clusters of fungi to extricate the source of the signal…
清除真菌，找到信号的源头…
Clearing the moutain of ash and debris to find the signal's source…
清扫灰烬和残骸，找到信号的源头…
Used after "Duration: " to show something happens immediately
You must have a hero present to explore this site
必须在有英雄在场的情况下才能探索此地点
An anomalous site requires your attention
一个异常地点需要注意
Used to indicate that a success chance roll was successful
Used to indicate that a success chance roll was unsuccessful
Placed before a description of a special ability that will be given to a particular hero
Refers to a colony where an upgrade will be built
Our analysis has been completed, yielding a treasure trove of data on lost Star Union technology![br/][br/]We receive {INT_researchAmount}[research/].
分析已经完成，我们发现了一个属于失落星际联盟技术的数据宝库！[br/][br/]获得 {INT_researchAmount}[research/]。
Our analysis has revealed the location of a Star Union ruin which may contain artifacts of great value. We should send a hero-led expedition as soon as possible!
我们的分析显示出了一个星际联盟废墟的位置，这个废墟中可能有许多极具价值的神器。我们应该尽快派出一支英雄率领的探险队前往！
While attempting to establish a base in this sector, we uncovered an Anomalous Site! The site could contain valuable data and artifacts. We should send a hero-led expedition as soon as possible!
我们在这个区域建立基地时发现了一个异常地点！这个地方可能有珍贵的数据和神器。我们应该尽快派出一支英雄率领的探险队前往！
While attempting to establish a colony in this sector, we uncovered an Anomalous Site! The site could contain valuable data and artifacts. We should send a hero-led expedition as soon as possible!
我们在这个区域建立殖民地时发现了一个异常地点！这个地方可能有珍贵的数据和神器。我们应该尽快派出一支英雄率领的探险队前往！
While clearing the battlefield, we uncovered an Anomalous Site! The site could contain valuable data and artifacts. We should send a hero led expedition as soon as possible!
我们在清理战场时发现了一个异常地点！这个地方可能有珍贵的数据和神器。我们应该尽快派出一支英雄率领的探险队前往！
A Stadium Arcadium has appeared nearby
附近出现了一个星际体育场
An Overgrown Biodome has appeared nearby
附近出现了一个巨型生物穹顶
An Abandoned Quarry has appeared nearby
附近出现了一座遗弃采矿场
A Sun Shard has appeared nearby
附近出现了一块太阳碎片
A Research Station has appeared nearby
附近出现了一个研究所
An Essence Well has appeared nearby
附近出现了一口精华之井
A Charge Station has appeared nearby
附近出现了一个充能站
All units in the army except for the hero suffered {DamageSuffered} damage
军队中的所有单位（除英雄外）受到 {DamageSuffered} 伤害
区域地表已改造为火山
A Growth Dwelling has appeared nearby
附近出现了一个灵植居住地
The hero and their army earn {INT_xpAmount} more XP from anomalous sites, and the resource costs of choices in sites are reduced by {INT_discountAmount}.
英雄及其军队从异常地点中额外获得 {INT_xpAmount} 经验值；此外，该地点所选资源消耗降低 {INT_discountAmount}。
Choices in anomalous sites now take {INT_numTurns} fewer turns (can never be reduced below 1[turn/]). Completing an anomalous site with this hero will now grant an extra research[research/] reward.
异常地点的选择减少 {INT_numTurns} 个回合（不得少于 1[turn/]）。使用该英雄完成异常地点时，将会额外获得研究[research/]奖励。

All success chances in anomalous sites are increased by {INT_successChancePercent}. Research rewards from anomalous sites are increased by {INT_researchRewardPercent}. Completing a anomalous site with this hero will now grant an extra energy[energy/] reward.
异常地点中的所有成功率增加 {INT_successChancePercent}。异常地点的研究奖励增加 {INT_researchRewardPercent}。使用该英雄完成异常地点时，将会额外获得能量[energy/]奖励。
Your relation with all races has increased by {RelationIncrease}.
你与所有种族的关系提升 {RelationIncrease}。
Controls how many anomalous sites are placed in the world. Anomalous sites are mini story adventures that can be explored by heroes for special rewards.
用来决定星球上出现的异常地点数量。异常地点会触发一小段冒险故事。英雄可以探索异常地点，从而获得特殊奖励。
A hero must remain present to explore this site
必须有英雄持续在场的情况下才能探索此地点
